lines.text: Distressed villager: Oh someone else! Could you please help me?
Distressed villager: I was going to deliver an offering to Aramo... but once I reached into my pocket to retrieve it, it wasn't there!
Distressed villager: Instead there was this note with a riddle on it, I looked around and saw a pink blur and I could swear I heard it laughing...
Distressed villager: I am hoping this riddle will lead me to my offering, but I suck at riddles, could you help me?
Beatriz: I can try! What does the riddle say?

Distressed villager: To retrieve your guiding tribute, this riddle you must continue!
The dolmens stand tall, but which one is above all?
There make way and ask yourself. What gets bigger the more you take away?
